author: MihaiStreames
description: Monitor and manage your Steam game libraries
long_description:
# Steam Library Monitor

Track your Steam game installations, library sizes, and drive usage across multiple Steam libraries.

## Features

- **Multi-library support**: Monitor games across all your Steam library folders
- **Real-time updates**: Automatically detects game installs, updates, and removals
- **Size tracking**: Track game sizes, shader caches, and workshop content
- **Drive usage**: See how much space Steam is using on each drive

## Requirements

- Steam must be installed
- Steam libraries must be accessible to the ContaraNAS user
